item.description:
Please join us for a discussion of Chapter 2 of "The Artist's Way" or Chapter 1 of "Finding Water." We'll have small group chapter discussions in the first half, with at least one group dedicated to "Finding Water," then general discussion in the second half, bolstered by warm beverages.

If you're starting out with "The Artist's Way" this is still a good place to jump in.

We'll be back at Gallery 263 after our overland excursion to the library. There's new art on the walls, and the furnace is functioning well. Parking and MBTA information in comments below.

Once you've had a chance to read your chapter, let us know if there's a particular task or topic that interests you. There's a discussion thread for "Artist's Way" HERE, and one for "Finding Water" HERE.

**Please note that we are STILL MEETING AT 7pm **

If you are able, please bring a $5 donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
